text: Ate jadom' tere raba ne farisati'am nu kiha ki maim dharati te ika khalifa (varisa) bana'una vala ham. Farisati'am ne kiha, ki tusim dharati te ajihe lokam nu vasa'unge jo usa nala jhagara karana ate lahu vaha'una. Ate asim teri prasasa karade ham ate teri pavitarata bi'ana karade ham. Alaha ne kiha ki maim uha janada ham jo tusi nahim janade
